description: This spicy and filling harissa chicken and bean soup is a satisfying one pot meal packed with flavour.
keywords: Chicken soup,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Harissa Chicken & Bean Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g chicken thighs, skinless and boneless, chopped
1.5L chicken stock, hot, made with 2 stock cubes
1L chicken stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, deep pan and cook the chicken for 5 minutes until browned all over. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside. Add the onions and cook for 4 minutes.
Stir in the garlic, carrots and celery and cook for 5 minutes. Add the harissa paste and cook for 2 minutes. Pour over the stock and passata, bring to the boil and reduce the heat.
Add the chicken and chickpeas and simmer for 15-17 minutes with the lid partially on, until the chicken is cooked through.
